SEARCH
Package application

Class Answer

java.lang.Object
application.Answer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Post
public class Answer extends Object implements Post
The Answer class represents an answer to a question. It provides CRUD operations to create, read, update, and delete answer records in the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer(int questionId, String content, boolean answered)
      Constructor for a new Answer (without an assigned ID yet).
      Parameters:
      questionId - The ID of the question to which this answer belongs.
      content - The content of the answer.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the content is null or empty.

    • Answer

      public Answer(int id, int questionId, String content, boolean answered)
      Constructor for an existing Answer (with a known ID).
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the answer.
      questionId - The ID of the associated question.
      content - The content of the answer.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the content is null or empty.

    • read

      public static Answer read(DatabaseHelper dbHelper, int answerId) throws SQLException
      Reads an Answer from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      dbHelper - The DatabaseHelper instance providing the database connection.
      answerId - The ID of the answer to read.
      Returns:
      An Answer object if found; otherwise, null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while querying the database.
